title: Yarbus' Folly
media: Wood, Acrylic, and one-way mirror film
statement: 􏰟􏰕􏰏􏰚􏰘􏰉􏰠􏰇*Yarbus' Folly* is a structure the viewer can enter and reflect upon the gallery in isolation, creating narratives within the space of the gallery. The onlooker should spend at least five minutes looking through the window onto the space.
